src.main module

VidwaanAI CLI Entry Point.

src.main.get_agent() → VidwaanAI[source]

Get or initialize the VidwaanAI agent.

src.main.list_scriptures(detailed: bool = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>) → None[source]

List all loaded scriptures.

src.main.query_handler(question: str = <typer.models.ArgumentInfo object>, language: str | None = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>, scripture: str | None = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>, verbose: bool = <typer.models.OptionInfo object>) → None[source]

Query VidwaanAI about Indian scriptures.
